span.span: RBA is committed to our student's health and well-being. During these unprecedented times, we have created several Covid-19 document resources for you to access as we begin Distance Learning. If you are unable to find what you are looking for, please reach out to var first='ma';var second='il';var third='to:';var address='elisa.voeltz';var domain='rochesterbeaconacademy';var ext='org';document.write('');document.write(address);document.write('@');document.write(domain); document.write('.');document.write(ext);document.write(''); and we can further assist you.

Rochester, MN 55901
